SQL.LOAD: SELECT oc_template_group_id, template_code, description, has_customized_params_xcd, allow_manual_use_xcd, allow_manual_resend_xcd, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, template_type_xcd, sms_app_key, sms_short_code, sms_trigger_id, oc_template_id FROM elp_oc_template WHERE oc_template_id = :oc_template_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_TEMPLATE_GROUP_ID: SELECT oc_template_group_id, template_code, description, has_customized_params_xcd, allow_manual_use_xcd, allow_manual_resend_xcd, effective_date, expiration_date, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date, template_type_xcd, sms_app_key, sms_short_code, sms_trigger_id, oc_template_id FROM elp_oc_template WHERE oc_template_group_id = :oc_template_group_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_DEALERS_AND_TEMPLATE_GROUP: select tg.OC_TEMPLATE_GROUP_ID, tg.CODE TEMPLATE_GROUP_CODE, tg.DESCRIPTION TEMPLATE_GROUP_DESCRIPTION, t.OC_TEMPLATE_ID, t.TEMPLATE_CODE, t.DESCRIPTION TEMPLATE_DESCRIPTION, t.template_type_xcd from elp_oc_template_group tg left join elp_oc_template t on tg.OC_TEMPLATE_GROUP_ID = t.OC_TEMPLATE_GROUP_ID where exists ( select * from elp_oc_template_group_dealer tgd inner join elp_dealer d on tgd.DEALER_ID = d.DEALER_ID where tgd.OC_TEMPLATE_GROUP_ID = tg.OC_TEMPLATE_GROUP_ID --dynamic_in_clause --dynamic_where_clause_dealer ) --dynamic_where_clause
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_oc_template SET oc_template_group_id = :oc_template_group_id, template_code = :template_code, description = :description, has_customized_params_xcd = :has_customized_params_xcd, allow_manual_use_xcd = :allow_manual_use_xcd, allow_manual_resend_xcd = :allow_manual_resend_xcd, effective_date = :effective_date, expiration_date = :expiration_date, template_type_xcd = :template_type_xcd, sms_app_key = :sms_app_key, sms_short_code = :sms_short_code, sms_trigger_id = :sms_trigger_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE oc_template_id = :oc_template_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_oc_template ( oc_template_group_id, template_code, description, has_customized_params_xcd, allow_manual_use_xcd, allow_manual_resend_xcd, effective_date, expiration_date, template_type_xcd, sms_app_key, sms_short_code, sms_trigger_id, created_by, oc_template_id ) VALUES ( :oc_template_group_id, :template_code, :description, :has_customized_params_xcd, :allow_manual_use_xcd, :allow_manual_resend_xcd, :effective_date, :expiration_date, :template_type_xcd, :sms_app_key, :sms_short_code, :sms_trigger_id, :created_by, :oc_template_id )
SQL.GET_ASSOCIATED_MESSAGE_COUNT: select count(oc_message_id) number_of_messages from elp_oc_message where oc_template_id = :oc_template_id
SQL.GET_COUNT_BY_CODE_EXCLUDING_TEMPLATE_ID: select count(oc_template_id) number_of_templates from elp_oc_template where TRIM(UPPER(template_code)) = TRIM(UPPER(:template_code)) and oc_template_id <> :oc_template_id and oc_template_group_id = :oc_template_group_id
